snippet: Mr. Johnson said he would not seek re-election after the release of a videotaped police interview with a teenager who said he sexually abused her when he was a basketball player.
abstract: Release of videotape in which woman who accused Sacramento Mayor Kevin Johnson of sexually assault during his time in NBA describes allegations in detail leads ESPN to cancel national release of documentary chronicling Johnson's achievements; Johnson has announced that he will not seek third term as mayor, but does not say whether resurfacing of accusation had impact on his decision.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Johnson said he would not seek re-election after the release of a videotaped police interview with a teenager who said he sexually abused her when he was a basketball player.

headline.print_headline: Abuse Claims From 20 Years Ago Resurface for Sacramento’s Mayor
headline.main: For Kevin Johnson, Sacramento Mayor, Abuse Claims Resurface
